title: Role-Based Instructional Design for Collaborative Knowledge Building

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theories and basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning environment using digital devices to strengthen language education expertise for pre-/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can perform 6 roles (initiator, supporter, argumentator, questioner, challenger, timekeeper) appropriately in collaborative knowledge-building processes
Learners can systematically record and analyze collective cognitive processes using digital collaboration tools
Learners can develop problem-solving models applicable to language education settings through role-based collaborative learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
